settings.helpText: Include Zodiac Sign and Table Number

copy.en-US:
[Twilight Imperium](https://www.fantasyflightgames.com/en/products/twilight-imperium-fourth-edition/) is a monstrous game of Galactic Conquest, where six players vie for galactic domination through military might, political maneuvering, and economic bargaining. It’s a [fantastic game of strategy](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PLybps39ZwM), ugly victories and beautiful defeats that we’re all huge fans of playing.

Unfortunately playing TI4 is a bit of a commitment. A standard game typically lasts an entire day. Given the length, it can be a bit difficult to get the game out to the table. To help alleviate that issue, we’ve created a group dedicated to providing a space for Twilight Imperium players in New York City to meet and organize games, share resources, and [talk](https://www.facebook.com/groups/TI.NYC/about/) about our favorite epic space opera board game!

Every month TI4 NYC players will gather in offices and homes across the city to play a game. The points of every game are tabulated, and in December we’ll crown a city Champion. 

Whether you've sat upon the throne of Mecatol Rex countless times or your curious and want to check the game out, we'd be delighted to have you join our [facebook group](https://www.facebook.com/groups/TI.NYC/about/) and [sign up to play](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1shC5DcSe_p1zWmEzgjP-rvHgXtTNi-j0qXmxJx4Ofvk/edit?fbclid=IwAR2RD4mQQ8wlcsSwe36M0ioM4YDGr3O-sLERscEeuyVHGbQukDS-B0QEB-8#gid=0) in a future event!

copy.en-US:
New to the game? Want to brush up? Just want to spend time with the board?

Every few games, we'll run a tutorial of how to play Twilight Imperium. While we're big fans of [video tutorials](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_u2xEap5hBM "RTFM how to play TI4"), walking through the rules of the game, and playing *one* mock round together is always our favorite way to learn how to play. Whether you've never played before, or you're tied for first in the Zodiac League, it's an excellent opportunity to understand the rules before playing in the next League game! 

Take a look at our [Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/groups/TI.NYC/events/ "facebook group events") to make sure you don't miss the dates of the next tutorial.
